radiographic_examinations.findings: Homogeneous liver with normal signal intensity; sub cm right hepatic lesion likely representing biliary hamartoma; dilated central hepatic ducts; complete obliteration of the lumen of the common bile duct for a segment of approximately 15 mm; 14 x 19 mm T1 hypointense lesion at pancreatic head; prominent pancreatic duct with small dilated pancreatic side branches; pancreatic parenchymal bulkiness; no splenomegaly; normal adrenal glands; no hydronephrosis.
Concerning for mid-distal CBD obstruction with proximal dilation to 1.2 cm.
Concerning for mid-distal CBD obstruction with proximal dilation.
No filling defects and a patent CBD stent.
